languages.text: Большая пафосная статуя в честь императора

traits.locale_text: Большая пафосная статуя в честь императора

languages.text: Неумирающий простирает руки ко всем своим чадам, даруя им свою высшую награду — достойную смерть.
The Undying Emperor holds out His hands to all His children, offering them the highest reward — a worthy death.
languages.original_text: Неумирающий простирает руки ко всем своим чадам, даруя им свою высшую награду — достойную смерть.

traits.locale_text: The Undying Emperor holds out His hands to all His children, offering them the highest reward — a worthy death.
The Undying Emperor holds out His hands to all His children, offering them the highest reward — a worthy death.

The Undying Emperor holds out His hands to all His children, offering them the highest reward — a worthy death.

languages.text: El Emperador Inmortal extiende Sus manos hacia todos Sus hijos para ofrecerles la mayor de las recompensas: una muerte digna.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor holds out His hands to all His children, offering them the highest reward — a worthy death.

traits.locale_text: El Emperador Inmortal extiende Sus manos hacia todos Sus hijos para ofrecerles la mayor de las recompensas: una muerte digna.

languages.text: 不死の皇帝はすべての子供たちに手を差し伸べ、最高の報酬、すなわち価値ある死を与える。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor holds out His hands to all His children, offering them the highest reward — a worthy death.

traits.locale_text: 不死の皇帝はすべての子供たちに手を差し伸べ、最高の報酬、すなわち価値ある死を与える。

languages.text: 不死神皇向祂所有的子嗣伸出手，赐予他们至高无上的奖赏——死得其所。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor holds out His hands to all His children, offering them the highest reward — a worthy death.

traits.locale_text: 不死神皇向祂所有的子嗣伸出手，赐予他们至高无上的奖赏——死得其所。

languages.text: Der Todlose Imperator streckt Seine Hand all Seinen Kindern entgegen und bietet ihnen die größte Belohnung von allen – einen würdigen Tod.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor holds out His hands to all His children, offering them the highest reward — a worthy death.

traits.locale_text: Der Todlose Imperator streckt Seine Hand all Seinen Kindern entgegen und bietet ihnen die größte Belohnung von allen – einen würdigen Tod.

languages.text: L'Empereur Immortel tend la main à tous Ses enfants pour leur offrir la récompense suprême : une mort honorable.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor holds out His hands to all His children, offering them the highest reward — a worthy death.

traits.locale_text: L'Empereur Immortel tend la main à tous Ses enfants pour leur offrir la récompense suprême : une mort honorable.

languages.text: Ölmeyen İmparator, tüm çocuklarına el uzatarak en yüce ödülü sunar. Bu ödül ki saygın bir ölümdür.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor holds out His hands to all His children, offering them the highest reward — a worthy death.
